publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4037 John Swinney: The Draft Local Government and Housing Act 1989 Amendment (Scotland) Order 2009—That the Local Government and Communities Committee recommends that the draft Local Government and Housing Act 1989 Amendment (Scotland) Order 2009 be approved. Supported by: Bruce Crawford*

S3M-4037 John Swinney: The Draft Local Government and Housing Act 1989 Amendment (Scotland) Order 2009—That the Local Government and Communities Committee recommends that the draft Local Government and Housing Act 1989 Amendment (Scotland) Order 2009 be approved. Supported by: Bruce Crawford
